Package main.java.warzone.services

Interface GamePhaseService

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameLoopServiceImpl, MapEditorServiceImpl, OrderExecutorServiceImpl, OrderIssuanceServiceImpl, ReinforcementServiceImpl, StartupPhaseServiceImpl
public interface GamePhaseService
Interface specifying the behaviors necessary for every game phase.

    • handleGamePhase

      GamePhase handleGamePhase(GamePhase p_CurrPhase) throws WarzoneBaseException
      Handles the given game phase.
      Parameters:
      p_CurrPhase - Current game phase.
      Returns:
      Upcoming game phase.
      Throws:
      WarzoneBaseException - If issue occurs while handling given phase.
